values.value: All PFAS anchorages must meet the minimum strength requirement of supporting a 5,000lb static load per person attached and separate connection systems utilized for each employee. Fall restraint systems (which prevent the possibility of a fall) are required to have a minimum strength of 1,000lbs. per person attached. CFR 1926.502(d)(15)
If fall protection systems are in use, are proper anchorages being utilized?
